3컬럼. 일부 크기 지정

크기가 지정된 컬럼 외에는 나머지 영역을 균등하게 나눠 영역을 차지 함

12컬럼 지정 분할

.row에 .xu-row--column-12를 지정하여 균등하게 분할하되 최대 12컬럼을 넘지 않도록 함

개행된 나머지 6개의 컬럼은 폭 전체를 차지하지 않고 12분할 기준의 너비를 가짐

12컬럼 너비 지정

.--column-4.--xl-column-6

4컬럼 균등분할로 표시하되, xl 너비에서는 6컬럼 분할로 viewport에 따라 분리하여 지정

container-fluid

Bootstrap grid examples

Basic grid layouts to get you familiar with building within the Bootstrap grid system.

Five grid tiers

There are five tiers to the Bootstrap grid system, one for each range of devices we support. Each tier starts at a minimum viewport size and automatically applies to the larger devices unless overridden.

column--4
column--4
column--4
column--sm-4
column--sm-4
column--sm-4
column--md-4
column--md-4
column--md-4
column--lg-4
column--lg-4
column--lg-4
column--xl-4
column--xl-4
column--xl-4

Three equal columns

Get three equal-width columns starting at desktops and scaling to large desktops. On mobile devices, tablets and below, the columns will automatically stack.

column--md-4
column--md-4
column--md-4

Three unequal columns

Get three columns starting at desktops and scaling to large desktops of various widths. Remember, grid columns should add up to twelve for a single horizontal block. More than that, and columns start stacking no matter the viewport.

column--md-3
column--md-6
column--md-3

Two columns

Get two columns starting at desktops and scaling to large desktops.

column--md-8
column--md-4

Full width, single column

No grid classes are necessary for full-width elements.

Two columns with two nested columns

Per the documentation, nesting is easy—just put a row of columns within an existing column. This gives you two columns starting at desktops and scaling to large desktops, with another two (equal widths) within the larger column.

At mobile device sizes, tablets and down, these columns and their nested columns will stack.

column--md-8
column--md-6
column--md-6
column--md-4

Mixed: mobile and desktop

The Bootstrap v4 grid system has five tiers of classes: xs (extra small), sm (small), md (medium), lg (large), and xl (extra large). You can use nearly any combination of these classes to create more dynamic and flexible layouts.

Each tier of classes scales up, meaning if you plan on setting the same widths for xs and sm, you only need to specify xs.

column--12 column--md-8
column--6 column--md-4
column--6 column--md-4
column--6 column--md-4
column--6 column--md-4
column--6
column--6

Mixed: mobile, tablet, and desktop
